item.title: Babelfish: Translate blog entries (trash!)
item.author: Sebastian Nohn
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_babelfish
Babelfish
Translate blog entries (trash!)
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: Pagina statica: Visualizza una pagina statica nel tuo blog con la stessa grafica e formattazione del blog stesso
item.author: Marco Rinck, Garvin Hicking, David Rolston, Falk Doering, Stephan Manske, Pascal Uhlmann, Ian, Don Chambers
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_staticpage
Pagina statica
Visualizza una pagina statica nel tuo blog con la stessa grafica e formattazione del blog stesso
For: Serendipity 1.3

item.title: Validates authors login: Validates the login credentials of an author using the sidebar login form
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_loginform
Validates authors login
Validates the login credentials of an author using the sidebar login form
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: Links to next/previous entry: Allows viewing the next/previous entry when viewing
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Wesley Hwang-Chung
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_entrypaging
Links to next/previous entry
Allows viewing the next/previous entry when viewing
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Avatar Plugin: Show avatars inside comments. Gravatars, Pavatars, Favatars, Twitter, Identica and MyBlogLog avatars are supported.
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Grischa Brockhaus
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_gravatar
Avatar Plugin
Show avatars inside comments. Gravatars, Pavatars, Favatars, Twitter, Identica and MyBlogLog avatars are supported.
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: HTML-Code inside head (HTML-Head Nugget): Allows you to insert HTML-Code into the HEAD-area of your blog. You can use this for meta-tags or JavaScript inclusion.
item.author: Jannis Hermanns
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_head_nugget
HTML-Code inside head (HTML-Head Nugget)
Allows you to insert HTML-Code into the HEAD-area of your blog. You can use this for meta-tags or JavaScript inclusion.
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: Split long entries: Enables you to split longer entries into several subpages and provides you with an auto-generated table of contents
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Tadashi Jokagi, Thomas Werner
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_entrysplit
Split long entries
Enables you to split longer entries into several subpages and provides you with an auto-generated table of contents
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Rules for publishing: Applies some checks before an entry is published
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Gregor Voeltz
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_entrycheck
Rules for publishing
Applies some checks before an entry is published
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Freetag: Consente il libero tagging dei post
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Jonathan Arkell, Grischa Brockhaus, Lars Strojny, Malte Paskuda
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_freetag
Freetag
Consente il libero tagging dei post
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Multilingual entries: Allows to create multiple language versions of an entry
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Wesley Hwang-Chung
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_multilingual
Multilingual entries
Allows to create multiple language versions of an entry
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: LJ/MySpace/Serendipity Update Plugin: Uses XMLRPC to post to your Livejournal/MySpace/Serendipity
item.author: Kaustubh Srikanth, Ivan Makhonin
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_ljupdate
LJ/MySpace/Serendipity Update Plugin
Uses XMLRPC to post to your Livejournal/MySpace/Serendipity
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: Trackback-Control: Allows granular control over how trackbacks are sent when creating entries
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Malte Paskuda
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_trackback
Trackback-Control
Allows granular control over how trackbacks are sent when creating entries
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Show Emoticon/Smilie toolbar: Shows a toolbar to select emoticons to insert into your entry. Does NOT work in the WYSIWYG editor!
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Jay Bertrandt
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_emoticonchooser
Show Emoticon/Smilie toolbar
Shows a toolbar to select emoticons to insert into your entry. Does NOT work in the WYSIWYG editor!
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Amazon Media Button: Adds a button to allow Amazon.com search which are insertable into your entry
item.author: Matthew Groeninger
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_amazonchooser
Amazon Media Button
Adds a button to allow Amazon.com search which are insertable into your entry
For: Serendipity 1.4

item.title: External user authentication (LDAP)/tracking: Allows to use external ressource to validate logins. Logins will be cached in the Serendipity database framework. This plugin can also track logins inside the Database.
item.author: Garvin Hicking/Justin Alcorn
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_externalauth
External user authentication (LDAP)/tracking
Allows to use external ressource to validate logins. Logins will be cached in the Serendipity database framework. This plugin can also track logins inside the Database.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Hide/delete entries for non-registered users after a specific timespan: Hides all entries which are older than a specified age, so that they are only visible for registered users/authors.
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_outdate_entries
Hide/delete entries for non-registered users after a specific timespan
Hides all entries which are older than a specified age, so that they are only visible for registered users/authors.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Delete Link: Adds a delete link to the footer of each entry.
item.author: Cameron MacFarland, Brett Profitt
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_deletelink
Delete Link
Adds a delete link to the footer of each entry.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Markup: Markdown: Apply Markdown markup to entry text
item.author: Serendipity Team and Jan Lehnardt
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_markdown
Markup: Markdown
Apply Markdown markup to entry text
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: Photoblog Entries: Adds a single image to an entry.
item.author: Cameron MacFarland
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_photoblog
Photoblog Entries
Adds a single image to an entry.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Thumbnail Page: Shows a thumbnail page. Address is index.php?serendipity[page]=thumbs
item.author: Cameron MacFarland
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_thumbnails
Thumbnail Page
Shows a thumbnail page. Address is index.php?serendipity[page]=thumbs
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: Gallery Display: Allows anonymous users to view Serendipity media gallery
item.author: Arnan de Gans, Matthew Groeninger, and Stefan Willoughby
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_usergallery
Gallery Display
Allows anonymous users to view Serendipity media gallery
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: User Self-Registration: Allows blog visitors to create their own author account. Together with the Event-plugin (index.php?serendipity[subpage]=adduser) you can choose whether only registered users may post comments.
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_adduser
User Self-Registration
Allows blog visitors to create their own author account. Together with the Event-plugin (index.php?serendipity[subpage]=adduser) you can choose whether only registered users may post comments.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: PHPOpenTracker: Logs accesses to the blog using PHPOpenTracker. Requires installed phpOpenTracker, please see readme.txt for further information.
item.author: Rene Schmidt
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_phpopentracker
PHPOpenTracker
Logs accesses to the blog using PHPOpenTracker. Requires installed phpOpenTracker, please see readme.txt for further information.
For: Serendipity 0.9

item.title: Easy Podcasting Plugin: Adds "podcasting" capabilities hinzu (RSS enclosure, Video/Sound-Player)
item.author: Grischa Brockhaus, Hannes Gassert, Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_podcast
Easy Podcasting Plugin
Adds "podcasting" capabilities hinzu (RSS enclosure, Video/Sound-Player)
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: Layout-Plugin: Link-Markup: Allows to change the markup of links in the entrybody
item.author: Sebastian Nohn
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_layout_linkmarkup
Layout-Plugin: Link-Markup
Allows to change the markup of links in the entrybody
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: Layout-Plugin: Quote-Markup: Allows to change the markup of quotes in the entrybody
item.author: Sebastian Nohn
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_layout_quotemarkup
Layout-Plugin: Quote-Markup
Allows to change the markup of quotes in the entrybody
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Link List: Links manager - Shows your favorite links in the sidebar.
item.author: Matthew Groeninger, Omid Mottaghi Rad
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_linklist
Link List
Links manager - Shows your favorite links in the sidebar.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Y!Q Related Search: Finds related pages using Yahoo's context sensitive search technology
item.author: Rasmus Lerdorf
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_yq
Y!Q Related Search
Finds related pages using Yahoo's context sensitive search technology
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Guestbook: Shows a guestbook inside your blog with your normal blog design.
item.author: Ian (Timbalu)
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_guestbook
Guestbook
Shows a guestbook inside your blog with your normal blog design.
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: My Mood: Allows you to add your current mood or moods to entries.
item.author: Brett Profitt
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_mymood
My Mood
Allows you to add your current mood or moods to entries.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Custom Permalinks for Entries: Defines custom permalinks that can be used to access a specific entry. It can only use URL patterns which are NOT YET in use - using custom permalinks within the /archives/ structure is thus not possible. But any (virtual) other directory is.
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_custom_permalinks
Custom Permalinks for Entries
Defines custom permalinks that can be used to access a specific entry. It can only use URL patterns which are NOT YET in use - using custom permalinks within the /archives/ structure is thus not possible. But any (virtual) other directory is.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Transforms HTML for comments: Allows to insert HTML tags in comments (instead of stripping the tags, they are now converted to entities). Needs to be first of all markup plugins in the event queue!
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_unstrip_tags
Transforms HTML for comments
Allows to insert HTML tags in comments (instead of stripping the tags, they are now converted to entities). Needs to be first of all markup plugins in the event queue!
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: Frontend entry filtering: Allows visitors to filter/order your entries by several options
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_filter_entries
Frontend entry filtering
Allows visitors to filter/order your entries by several options
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Markup: GeSHi: Computer Language Color Syntax Highlighting. Tag usage: [geshi lang=lang_name [,ln={y|n}]]code snippet[/geshi]
item.author: David Rolston
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_geshi
Markup: GeSHi
Computer Language Color Syntax Highlighting. Tag usage: [geshi lang=lang_name [,ln={y|n}]]code snippet[/geshi]
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: SMF Markup: SMF Markup
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_smfmarkup
SMF Markup
SMF Markup
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Adds CC to all sent emails: (Notice: Make sure that the all of your authors have the option to receiv comment notification emails activated, or else no mails will be created that can be CCed
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_mailcc
Adds CC to all sent emails
(Notice: Make sure that the all of your authors have the option to receiv comment notification emails activated, or else no mails will be created that can be CCed
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: StalkerBuster (TM,C,R): Denies access to baddies. Write line-separated list of blocked cookies to a stalkerbuster.php file in your root.
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_stalkerbuster
StalkerBuster (TM,C,R)
Denies access to baddies. Write line-separated list of blocked cookies to a stalkerbuster.php file in your root.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Spam: Challenge/Response:
item.author: Nobody
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_challengeresponse
Spam: Challenge/Response

For: Serendipity 1.0

item.title: External PHP Application: Shows an external PHP application inside your blog with your blogs design and all formattings. USE WITH CARE, THIS PLUGIN HAS SECURITY IMPLICATIONS AS IT INCLUDES ANY GENERIC PHP FILE! YOU CAN ONLY USE THIS PLUGIN AS ADMIN!
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_externalphp
External PHP Application
Shows an external PHP application inside your blog with your blogs design and all formattings. USE WITH CARE, THIS PLUGIN HAS SECURITY IMPLICATIONS AS IT INCLUDES ANY GENERIC PHP FILE! YOU CAN ONLY USE THIS PLUGIN AS ADMIN!
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: Markup: Smarty Parsing: Parses Smarty instructions inside the article text
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_smartymarkup
Markup: Smarty Parsing
Parses Smarty instructions inside the article text
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Music of the Moment: Real time music status from iTunes using iTunesBlogger: http://www.ituneshacking.com/wiki/wakka.php?wakka=iTunesBloggerHomePage
item.author: Tys von Gaza
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_motm
Music of the Moment
Real time music status from iTunes using iTunesBlogger: http://www.ituneshacking.com/wiki/wakka.php?wakka=iTunesBloggerHomePage
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: RSS Aggregator: Display entries from multiple RSS feeds ("Planet"). IMPORTANT NOTE: Updating and "feeding" your Aggregator must currently still happen manually via Cronjobs or similar. Call this URL with your custom timing interval: index.php?/plugin/aggregator
item.author: Evan Nemerson, Garvin Hicking, Kristian Koehntopp, Thomas Schulz, Claus Schmidt
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_aggregator
RSS Aggregator
Display entries from multiple RSS feeds ("Planet"). IMPORTANT NOTE: Updating and "feeding" your Aggregator must currently still happen manually via Cronjobs or similar. Call this URL with your custom timing interval: index.php?/plugin/aggregator
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Template Header/Logo Image: Switch header image or logo for templates
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Sebastian Mayeres, Jude Anthony
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_kubrickheader
Template Header/Logo Image
Switch header image or logo for templates
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Show last modification date: Shows a message with the last modification date of an entry on the blogs frontpage. For not modified entries shows a message that says they are not modified.
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_entrylastmodified
Show last modification date
Shows a message with the last modification date of an entry on the blogs frontpage. For not modified entries shows a message that says they are not modified.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: GeoURL: GeoURL allocates URLs to locations. More Information at http://geourl.org/
item.author: Serendipity Team
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_geourl
GeoURL
GeoURL allocates URLs to locations. More Information at http://geourl.org/
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: MimeTex/LaTeX TeX Interpreter: Create Gifs from TeX expressions using MimeTex or LaTeX
item.author: Matthew Groeninger
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_mimetex
MimeTex/LaTeX TeX Interpreter
Create Gifs from TeX expressions using MimeTex or LaTeX
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Typeset/Extended Buttons for non-WYSIWYG editors: Adds buttons for various encoded typeset entities and other extended actions.
item.author: Matthew Groeninger, Malte Diers
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_typesetbuttons
Typeset/Extended Buttons for non-WYSIWYG editors
Adds buttons for various encoded typeset entities and other extended actions.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: POPfetcher: Fetches and publishes email and attachments from a POP3 email account (with special cell phone support)
item.author: Jason Levitt
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_popfetcher
POPfetcher
Fetches and publishes email and attachments from a POP3 email account (with special cell phone support)
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Toggle Sidebar state (collapsed/uncollapsed): Shrinks Sidebars to just their titles. Extra configuration in Entries -> Manage Sidebars in the Admin Suite.
item.author: Tys von Gaza, Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_sidebarhider
Toggle Sidebar state (collapsed/uncollapsed)
Shrinks Sidebars to just their titles. Extra configuration in Entries -> Manage Sidebars in the Admin Suite.
For: Serendipity 0.9

item.title: Picasa: Shows Picasa albums exported as XML
item.author: Thomas Nesges, Greg Greenway
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_picasa
Picasa
Shows Picasa albums exported as XML
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Modulo di contatto: Mostra un modulo di contatto e-mail sul tuo blog come pagina statica, cui si può accedere sia da permalink personalizzato che da index.php?serendipity[subpage]=contactform. Puoi personalizzare l'aspetto del modulo inserendo il file plugin_contactform.tpl nella tua directory dei template e modificandolo là. I captchas del plugin Spamblock (se attivi) verranno applicati.
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_contactform
Modulo di contatto
Mostra un modulo di contatto e-mail sul tuo blog come pagina statica, cui si può accedere sia da permalink personalizzato che da index.php?serendipity[subpage]=contactform. Puoi personalizzare l'aspetto del modulo inserendo il file plugin_contactform.tpl nella tua directory dei template e modificandolo là. I captchas del plugin Spamblock (se attivi) verranno applicati.
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: e-Mail Entry: Allow users to e-mail a blog entry to a friend. Pay attention that this plugin can cause automatted traffic if bots are submitting your forms.
item.author: Serendipity Team
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_mailentry
e-Mail Entry
Allow users to e-mail a blog entry to a friend. Pay attention that this plugin can cause automatted traffic if bots are submitting your forms.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: HTML Link Metatags: Inserts link rel="start|up|prev|next|canonical" metatags into your frontend for better navigation.
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_linktoolbar
HTML Link Metatags
Inserts link rel="start|up|prev|next|canonical" metatags into your frontend for better navigation.
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: Layout-Plugin: Printerfriendly version: Using the print function of your browser, you will see a better printed representation of your Entry
item.author: Sebastian Nohn
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_layout_printerfriendly
Layout-Plugin: Printerfriendly version
Using the print function of your browser, you will see a better printed representation of your Entry
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: flickr Photostream CSS: This plugin is an extension to the flickr Photostream sidebar plugin and adds style information (CSS).
item.author: Michael Kaiser
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_flickrcss
flickr Photostream CSS
This plugin is an extension to the flickr Photostream sidebar plugin and adds style information (CSS).
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Export blog as PDF: Allows visitors to download your blog in the PDF format
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Olivier PLATHEY, Steven Wittens
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_blogpdf
Export blog as PDF
Allows visitors to download your blog in the PDF format
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Related entries/links: Insert related links/entries per entry. For flexibility you can edit the "plugin_relatedlinks.tpl" Smarty-Template file to adjust the output. Note that this plugin only outputs data in the detailed/full entry view.
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_relatedlinks
Related entries/links
Insert related links/entries per entry. For flexibility you can edit the "plugin_relatedlinks.tpl" Smarty-Template file to adjust the output. Note that this plugin only outputs data in the detailed/full entry view.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: ToDo/Project-List: Maintain a list of projects and their percentage completion.
item.author: Steven Tonnesen
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_todolist
ToDo/Project-List
Maintain a list of projects and their percentage completion.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Spam Protector (RBL): Will reject comments made from hosts which are listed in RBLs. Pay attention that this may affect proxy-users or dial-up users.
item.author: Sebastian Nohn
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_spamblock_rbl
Spam Protector (RBL)
Will reject comments made from hosts which are listed in RBLs. Pay attention that this may affect proxy-users or dial-up users.
For: Serendipity 1.2

item.title: Spam Protector (SURBL): Reject comments that contain blacklisted URLs
item.author: Sebastian Nohn
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_spamblock_surbl
Spam Protector (SURBL)
Reject comments that contain blacklisted URLs
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Simple Cached/Pregenerated Pages: [EXPERIMENTAL] Allows to cache/pregenerate pages. Note: Destroys dynamic capabilites and may not interoperate well with dynamic plugins. But it's faster, if you don't depend on realtime dynamics. (This plugin should be placed as early as possible in the event queue list. Only dynamic plugins like the karmavoting should be positioned before this plugin.)
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_cachesimple
Simple Cached/Pregenerated Pages
[EXPERIMENTAL] Allows to cache/pregenerate pages. Note: Destroys dynamic capabilites and may not interoperate well with dynamic plugins. But it's faster, if you don't depend on realtime dynamics. (This plugin should be placed as early as possible in the event queue list. Only dynamic plugins like the karmavoting should be positioned before this plugin.)
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Polls: Maintains your votings / polls
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_pollbox
Polls
Maintains your votings / polls
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Markup: Wordwrap long text: Inserts breaks for lengthy entries/comments
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_wordwrap
Markup: Wordwrap long text
Inserts breaks for lengthy entries/comments
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Extended options for media manager: Allows extended options for inserting images from the media manager [Serendipity >= 0.9]
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Vladimir Ajgl, Adam Charnock
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_imageselectorplus
Extended options for media manager
Allows extended options for inserting images from the media manager [Serendipity >= 0.9]
For: Serendipity 0.9

item.title: Markup: Typographic Smart Quotes: Convert straight quotes to smart quotes. Also can use SmartyPants PHP library (by Michel Fortin, based on SmartyPants by John Gruber) to provide further typographic replacement.
item.author: Jonathan Spalink and Matthew Groeninger
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_typoquote
Markup: Typographic Smart Quotes
Convert straight quotes to smart quotes. Also can use SmartyPants PHP library (by Michel Fortin, based on SmartyPants by John Gruber) to provide further typographic replacement.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: User Profiles: Shows simple user profiles and allows to embed author pictures.
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Falk Doering
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_userprofiles
User Profiles
Shows simple user profiles and allows to embed author pictures.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Customizable Entries Archive: Shows a sortable view of all past articles for the visitor. The link to this page should be inserted into a HTML nugget.
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_customarchive
Customizable Entries Archive
Shows a sortable view of all past articles for the visitor. The link to this page should be inserted into a HTML nugget.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: My Calendar: Maintains a personal calendar
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Markus Gerstel, Grischa Brockhaus
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_mycalendar
My Calendar
Maintains a personal calendar
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Coppermine Selector: Select images from a Coppermine gallery in new entries
item.author: Matthew Maude (modified by Jim Davies)
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_cpgselector
Coppermine Selector
Select images from a Coppermine gallery in new entries
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Category Assignment: Lets you assign multiple categories to entries
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_assigncategories
Category Assignment
Lets you assign multiple categories to entries
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Sitemap Generator (for Crawlers): Creates a sitemap.xml.gz, which can be used by miscellaneous Web-Crawlers. (Google, MSN, Yahoo and Ask)
item.author: Boris
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_google_sitemap
Sitemap Generator (for Crawlers)
Creates a sitemap.xml.gz, which can be used by miscellaneous Web-Crawlers. (Google, MSN, Yahoo and Ask)
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Random Blog Description: Shows a random description in the header. (Seperate database table has currently to be maintained manually)
item.author: Florian Anderiasch
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_randomblogdescription
Random Blog Description
Shows a random description in the header. (Seperate database table has currently to be maintained manually)
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Uses TinyMCE as WYSIWYG editor: Utilizes the TinyMCE WYSIWYG editor. Requires Serendipity 0.9 or later. After installation, read the installation guide in the configuration screen for this plugin.
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Grischa Brockhaus
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_tinymce
Uses TinyMCE as WYSIWYG editor
Utilizes the TinyMCE WYSIWYG editor. Requires Serendipity 0.9 or later. After installation, read the installation guide in the configuration screen for this plugin.
For: Serendipity 0.9

item.title: Options for trustworthy editing on multi-user blogs: This plugin can specify, which authors on a multi-user blog you have enough trust in and do not expect hacking attempts. All other users are treated as possibly evil and cannot create HTML entries.
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_xsstrust
Options for trustworthy editing on multi-user blogs
This plugin can specify, which authors on a multi-user blog you have enough trust in and do not expect hacking attempts. All other users are treated as possibly evil and cannot create HTML entries.
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: HTML Nugget on Page: Puts an HTML nugget on top or bottom of the page, or inside the page's HEAD tag
item.author: Wesley Hwang-Chung
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_page_nugget
HTML Nugget on Page
Puts an HTML nugget on top or bottom of the page, or inside the page's HEAD tag
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Markup: Include entry data/templates/blocks: Allows you to add HTML-style tags to your entry that includes parts of other entrys. Use this markup: [s9y-include-entry:XXX:YYY]. Replace XXX with the target entryid and YYY with the target field name (i.e. "body", "title", "extended", ...). You can also use the new menu functions to maintain templates and blocks that can get inserted in between your entries.
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_includeentry
Markup: Include entry data/templates/blocks
Allows you to add HTML-style tags to your entry that includes parts of other entrys. Use this markup: [s9y-include-entry:XXX:YYY]. Replace XXX with the target entryid and YYY with the target field name (i.e. "body", "title", "extended", ...). You can also use the new menu functions to maintain templates and blocks that can get inserted in between your entries.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Properties/Templates of categories: This plugin provides additional properties for categories and their entries, including custom templates, sort order, display limit, password protection, and RSS hiding.
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Judebert
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_categorytemplates
Properties/Templates of categories
This plugin provides additional properties for categories and their entries, including custom templates, sort order, display limit, password protection, and RSS hiding.
For: Serendipity 0.9

item.title: Post via XML-RPC: Allows to post/edit entries via the XML-RPC API (MT, Blogger, WordPress Endpoints)

Post via XML-RPC
Allows to post/edit entries via the XML-RPC API (MT, Blogger, WordPress Endpoints)
For: Serendipity 0.8

For: Serendipity 0.8

item.author: Rob Antonishen, Alexander Mieland
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_galleryimage
Markup: Gallery Image
Inserts a Gallery album or image using markup text.

serendipity_event_httpauth
HTTP-Authentication
Authenticates users via HTTP auth using their s9y user login data.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Show entries via JavaScript: Provides javascript output of recent entries for inclusion on other, extern websites. (see the README in the plugins directory!)

item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_backend
Show entries via JavaScript
Provides javascript output of recent entries for inclusion on other, extern websites. (see the README in the plugins directory!)

item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_geotag
Geotag
Allows entries to be geotagged with coordinates
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Backup Interface: Provides the ability to automatically make backups from your s9y, the database-tables, the whole database and the files. Only MySQL(i) databases are currently supported. WARNING: This plugin does not work well with large databases or directories.
item.author: Alexander 'dma147' Mieland, http://blog.linux-stats.org, dma147@linux-stats.org
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_backup
Backup Interface
Provides the ability to automatically make backups from your s9y, the database-tables, the whole database and the files. Only MySQL(i) databases are currently supported. WARNING: This plugin does not work well with large databases or directories.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Discussion forum / phpBB comment mirroring: Provides a complete discussion forum to your users. Can alternatively provide to mirror comments into a phpBB installation.
item.author: Alexander 'dma147' Mieland, http://blog.linux-stats.org, dma147@linux-stats.org
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_forum
Discussion forum / phpBB comment mirroring
Provides a complete discussion forum to your users. Can alternatively provide to mirror comments into a phpBB installation.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.author: Rob Antonishen
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_glossary
Glossary
A user defined glossary as highlighted text with a tooltip.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.author: Stefan Willoughby, Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_startcat
Start Page Category
Allows you to show only one category on the frontpage
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_markread
Show read/unread state of entries for visitors
Show read/unread state of entries for visitors
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.author: Omid Mottaghi
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_forgotpassword
Forgot Password
Change the password for selected user
For: Serendipity 0.9.1

item.title: Markup: RegexpMarkup: Mark up via user custom regexp files. See example files in "regexps" subdirectory of this plugin.
item.author: Rob Antonishen
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_regexpmarkup
Markup: RegexpMarkup
Mark up via user custom regexp files. See example files in "regexps" subdirectory of this plugin.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Newsbox: Group a category's entries in a frontpage box instead of the usual article listing. Supports nested newsboxes.
item.author: Jude Anthony
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_newsbox
Newsbox
Group a category's entries in a frontpage box instead of the usual article listing. Supports nested newsboxes.
For: Serendipity 1.0-alpha1

item.title: Community Rating: You can rate products, movies or anything else and display your rating within your associated entries. Also enables you to share your ratings with other users of these plugins. This plugin requires you to edit template files, please read the README file.
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Lewe Zipfel
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_communityrating
Community Rating
You can rate products, movies or anything else and display your rating within your associated entries. Also enables you to share your ratings with other users of these plugins. This plugin requires you to edit template files, please read the README file.
For: Serendipity 0.9

item.title: Enhanced Comment Area: Uses JavaScript to show a live preview and markup-buttons
item.author: Malte Paskuda, Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_livecomment
Enhanced Comment Area
Uses JavaScript to show a live preview and markup-buttons
For: Serendipity 1.0

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions: Edit the Frequently Asked Question.
item.author: Falk Doering
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_faq
Frequently Asked Questions
Edit the Frequently Asked Question.
For: Serendipity 0.9

item.title: Lightbox/Thickbox JS/Greybox: Lightbox JS is a simple, unobtrusive script used to to overlay images on the current page. It's a snap to setup and works on all modern browsers. Lightbox pops up images, while Thickbox can also display HTML popup links. Both scripts work like this: They search through your entries, and replace every 'a href="XXX"' link and then replace that link to use the internal display. So if you want your thumbnail images to popup large, you need to insert your images as links to the large version. Using thickbox, you can put a 'class="thickbox"' attribute into your 'a href' links so that they will popup in a window.
item.author: Thomas Nesges, Andy Hopkins, Lokesh Dhakar, Cody Lindley, Stephan Manske, Grischa Brockhaus
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_lightbox
Lightbox/Thickbox JS/Greybox
Lightbox JS is a simple, unobtrusive script used to to overlay images on the current page. It's a snap to setup and works on all modern browsers. Lightbox pops up images, while Thickbox can also display HTML popup links. Both scripts work like this: They search through your entries, and replace every 'a href="XXX"' link and then replace that link to use the internal display. So if you want your thumbnail images to popup large, you need to insert your images as links to the large version. Using thickbox, you can put a 'class="thickbox"' attribute into your 'a href' links so that they will popup in a window.
For: Serendipity 0.9

item.title: Versioning of entries: Can store and retrieve older versions of an entry
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_versioning
Versioning of entries
Can store and retrieve older versions of an entry
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Phoneblogz: This plugin allows to fetch messages from Phoneblogz.
item.author: Garvin Hicking, phoneblogz.com
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_phoneblogz
Phoneblogz
This plugin allows to fetch messages from Phoneblogz.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Import from Flickr: Import images from flickr.com into the media library
item.author: Jay Bertrand
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_flickr
Import from Flickr
Import images from flickr.com into the media library
For: Serendipity 0.9

item.title: Free Wiki links for your entries: You can specify new/existing links to your blog entries via [[title]], link to staticpages via ((title)) and link to both via {{title}}. References can be automatically appended to the blog entry.
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Grischa Brockhaus
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_wikilinks
Free Wiki links for your entries
You can specify new/existing links to your blog entries via [[title]], link to staticpages via ((title)) and link to both via {{title}}. References can be automatically appended to the blog entry.
For: Serendipity 1.0

item.title: HTML Validator: Validates entries on their XML-conformity
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_htmlvalidator
HTML Validator
Validates entries on their XML-conformity
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Show links to services like Facebook, Digg, Technorati, del.icio.us, spread.ly etc related to your entry.: You can remove/insert other custom services to link to via the "plugin_findmore.tpl" template file easily. Also remember that if you want to save grandma's performance pennies that you can also insert the HTML/JS snippets into your entries.tpl template file instead of using this plugin!
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Kodewulf
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_findmore
Show links to services like Facebook, Digg, Technorati, del.icio.us, spread.ly etc related to your entry.
You can remove/insert other custom services to link to via the "plugin_findmore.tpl" template file easily. Also remember that if you want to save grandma's performance pennies that you can also insert the HTML/JS snippets into your entries.tpl template file instead of using this plugin!
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Gallery2 Embed: : Embeds Gallery2 within Serendipity. You must be running the Gallery 2.1 core. Gallery 2.1 RC2a or newer REQUIRED.
item.author: Aaron Axelsen
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_g2embed
Gallery2 Embed:
Embeds Gallery2 within Serendipity. You must be running the Gallery 2.1 core. Gallery 2.1 RC2a or newer REQUIRED.
For: Serendipity 0.9.1

item.title: Autosave entries: Saves entries in background while editing
item.author: Jay Bertrand
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_autosave
Autosave entries
Saves entries in background while editing
For: Serendipity 0.9

item.title: getID3() support for fetching media properties: Uses the getID3() library to fetch extended media properties for movies/audio files. getID3() itself is not distributed with this plugin.
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Grischa Brockhaus
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_getid3
getID3() support for fetching media properties
Uses the getID3() library to fetch extended media properties for movies/audio files. getID3() itself is not distributed with this plugin.
For: Serendipity 1.1

item.title: Searches comments on quicksearch: If this plugin is installed, the quicksearch on your blog will also search through comments on your blog
item.author: Garvin Hicking

serendipity_event_commentsearch

If this plugin is installed, the quicksearch on your blog will also search through comments on your blog
For: Serendipity 0.8

serendipity_event_suggest

This plugin periodically executes plugins that provide/require periodic tasks. See the configuration of this plugin for details.

serendipity_event_adminnotes

item.content:encoded:

Google Analytics
This plugin adds extendet Google Analytic funcionality to youre Page like tracking external links or download links.

Advanced configuration types

item.author: Christian Brabandt (based on work of Garvin Hicking, Sebastian Nohn)
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_recaptcha
Recaptcha

item.title: Markup: Mobile Output: This plugin handles mobile devices and outputs optimized XHTML MP markup if it detects a mobile browser and a specially optimized site for iPhone and iPod Touch. It also scales images to fit the display size.
item.author: Pelle Boese, Grischa Brockhaus
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_mobile_output
Markup: Mobile Output
This plugin handles mobile devices and outputs optimized XHTML MP markup if it detects a mobile browser and a specially optimized site for iPhone and iPod Touch. It also scales images to fit the display size.
For: Serendipity 1.0

item.title: Dejure.org automatic linking: Automatically links quoted statues and judicature (references and source of information) with contents of dejure.org.
item.author: Garvin Hicking, dejure.org
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_dejure
Dejure.org automatic linking
Automatically links quoted statues and judicature (references and source of information) with contents of dejure.org.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: OpenID Authentication: Allows authors to authenticate using an OpenID, their Google or Yahoo account.
item.author: Grischa Brockhaus, Rob Richards
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_openid
OpenID Authentication
Allows authors to authenticate using an OpenID, their Google or Yahoo account.
For: Serendipity 1.2

item.title: Markup: Syntax Highlighter: This plugin is a JavaScript code highlighter based on the code of the same name by Alex Gorbatchev. This plugin takes less server-side resources than GeSHi and displays less markup in the actual HTML code. It's a lighter, cleaner alternative. This plugin requires the supporting theme to provide the following hooks: frontend_header, frontend_footer (and optionally backend_preview on the administrative theme only).
item.author: Alex Gorbatchev (core), Brendon Kozlowski and J.M. Roth (plugin)
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_dpsyntaxhighlighter
Markup: Syntax Highlighter
This plugin is a JavaScript code highlighter based on the code of the same name by Alex Gorbatchev. This plugin takes less server-side resources than GeSHi and displays less markup in the actual HTML code. It's a lighter, cleaner alternative. This plugin requires the supporting theme to provide the following hooks: frontend_header, frontend_footer (and optionally backend_preview on the administrative theme only).
For: Serendipity 1.0

item.title: Link SnapShots using snap.com: This plugin shows page previews, while the user is hovering over a link. To reach this aim the SnapShot service at www.snap.com is used. Snap.com is a free service, but be aware that snap.com *might* be able to collect data profiles about user IPs loading links from this blog site, although their privacy statement promise not to do so.
item.author: Grischa Brockhaus
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_snapshotlinks
Link SnapShots using snap.com
This plugin shows page previews, while the user is hovering over a link. To reach this aim the SnapShot service at www.snap.com is used. Snap.com is a free service, but be aware that snap.com *might* be able to collect data profiles about user IPs loading links from this blog site, although their privacy statement promise not to do so.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Microblogging (Twitter,Identica): Adds a twitter/identica client to the admininistration interface, searches for tweetbacks and announces new articles to a microblogging account.

serendipity_event_twitter
Microblogging (Twitter,Identica)
Adds a twitter/identica client to the admininistration interface, searches for tweetbacks and announces new articles to a microblogging account.

serendipity_event_spamblock_bayes
Spamblock (Bayes)
Detects Spam via an algorithmus which learns.

item.title: Event-Calendar (MySQL-only): Shows an event calendar inside your blogs with your normal blog design. It supports backend/frontend administration, multiple events and iCal export.
item.author: Ian (Timbalu)
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_cal
Event-Calendar (MySQL-only)
Shows an event calendar inside your blogs with your normal blog design. It supports backend/frontend administration, multiple events and iCal export.

item.title: Prettify for S9Y: Use Prettify to brush content between PRE tags for simple syntax highlighting.

item.content:encoded:

Prettify for S9Y
Use Prettify to brush content between PRE tags for simple syntax highlighting.
For: Serendipity 1.0

item.title: Markup: clickable email adresses - but with antispam: Makes email addresses clickabe, but obfuscates them to block spam harvester bots
item.author: Stephan Manske
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_email_bot_obfuscator
Markup: clickable email adresses - but with antispam
Makes email addresses clickabe, but obfuscates them to block spam harvester bots
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: oEmbed Plugin: oEmbed is a format for allowing an embedded representation of a URL on your blog. It allows blog articles to display embedded content (such as tweets, photos or videos) when a user posts a link to that resource, without having to parse the resource directly.
item.author: Grischa Brockhaus
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_oembed
oEmbed Plugin
oEmbed is a format for allowing an embedded representation of a URL on your blog. It allows blog articles to display embedded content (such as tweets, photos or videos) when a user posts a link to that resource, without having to parse the resource directly.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: BrowserID Authentification: Allows authors to authenticate using the BrowserID service.
item.author: Grischa Brockhaus
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_browserid
BrowserID Authentification
Allows authors to authenticate using the BrowserID service.
For: Serendipity 1.6

item.title: Realtime Comments: Load comments made from other users without reloading the page.
item.author: Malte Paskuda
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_realtimecomments
Realtime Comments
Load comments made from other users without reloading the page.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Flattr: Flattr is a social micropayment platform that lets you show love for the things you like. This plugin embedds "Flattr"-Badges in blog entries and RSS feeds. You can specify flattr-specific options per-entry, with a default global fallback.
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Joachim Breitner
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_flattr
Flattr
Flattr is a social micropayment platform that lets you show love for the things you like. This plugin embedds "Flattr"-Badges in blog entries and RSS feeds. You can specify flattr-specific options per-entry, with a default global fallback.
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: Template Editor: Edit the files of the currently used template directly form the adminarea.
item.author: Malte Paskuda
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_template_editor
Template Editor
Edit the files of the currently used template directly form the adminarea.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Comment Spice: Spice up your comments area with goodies like commenters twitter or last posted article link and nofollows by rules.
item.author: Grischa Brockhaus
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_commentspice
Comment Spice
Spice up your comments area with goodies like commenters twitter or last posted article link and nofollows by rules.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Autoupdate (Experimental): Experimental. When the dashboard-plugin detects an update, this plugin adds the option to update the blog directly with one click from within the adminarea.
item.author: onli
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_autoupdate
Autoupdate (Experimental)
Experimental. When the dashboard-plugin detects an update, this plugin adds the option to update the blog directly with one click from within the adminarea.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Spamblock Bee (Honeypot, Hidden Captcha): Implements simple comment antispam mechanisms, that are easy to configure but very effective.
item.author: Grischa Brockhaus, Janek Bevendorff
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_spamblock_bee
Spamblock Bee (Honeypot, Hidden Captcha)
Implements simple comment antispam mechanisms, that are easy to configure but very effective.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: DBClean: Cleanup database
item.author: Malte Paskuda
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_dbclean
DBClean
Cleanup database
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Facebook (Experimental!): Imports comments made on facebook postings (like through RSS Graffiti) back into the blog. Also embeds Facebook OpenGraph Meta-Tags into the blog. Note that adding "like"-Buttons to blog entries is achieved via the serendipity_event_findmore plugin!
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_facebook
Facebook (Experimental!)
Imports comments made on facebook postings (like through RSS Graffiti) back into the blog. Also embeds Facebook OpenGraph Meta-Tags into the blog. Note that adding "like"-Buttons to blog entries is achieved via the serendipity_event_findmore plugin!
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: UTF-8 aware sorting: This plugin offers special UTF-8 alphabetic sorting as an extension so specific plugins like Freetag. It allows to sort by kyrillic and other foreign characters with a custom alphabet. Alphabet contributions are welcome (on the s9y forums).
item.author: LazyBadger, Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_sort
UTF-8 aware sorting
This plugin offers special UTF-8 alphabetic sorting as an extension so specific plugins like Freetag. It allows to sort by kyrillic and other foreign characters with a custom alphabet. Alphabet contributions are welcome (on the s9y forums).
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Disqus comments: Disqus.com is a webservice that allows you to manage comments, with central logins. It stores and manages comments outside of your Serendipity installation, and is embedded using JavaScript. For more information see disqus.com.
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Grischa Brockhaus
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_event_disqus
Disqus comments
Disqus.com is a webservice that allows you to manage comments, with central logins. It stores and manages comments outside of your Serendipity installation, and is embedded using JavaScript. For more information see disqus.com.
For: Serendipity 0.7
